attributes.background:
Animals all around the world are in danger! We need to make a movement before we don’t have any animals!

50 percent of all known mammals see rapidly decreasing populations, and almost 20 percent are close to extinction.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to address the serious issue you raise.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
